classes.description: Class to remove the default background color

classes.name: box--radius-none
classes.description: Class to remove the default background color

classes.name: box--border-[color-name]
classes.description: Class to render different border colors for a box module

classes.description: Class to remove the default border

classes.description: Add single-level elevation to a box

classes.description: Add 8th level depth elevation to a box

classes.description: Add multiple-level elevation to a box

classes.description: Float a box to the left of a given area

classes.description: Float a box to the right of a given area

classes.description: Float a box to the bottom of a given area

classes.description: Float a box to the top of a given area

classes.description: Creating a responsive behavior for floating boxes

classes.description: Using box as a absolute reference point

classes.description: A wrapping class for progressively stacking box panels

classes.name: box--full-height
classes.description: Class to add a height of 100%

description: The **box layout** component is a utility with a series of spacing helper classes used to box off content in the UI layout and define spacing through a variety of padding options.
name: Box Layout
usage:
A box can be built of div by using the various classes provided by this module. Adding the `box` class to div will style it as a box. It can then be further decorated in size as shown below. Here is the list of available colors for border and background colors classes: eds-white, gray-100, gray-200, gray-300, gray-400, gray-500, gray-600, gray-700, gray-800, gray-900, gray-1000, gray-1100, gray-1200, gray-1300, gray-1400, gray-1500, gray-1600, gray-1700, gray-1800, gray-1900, gray-2000, gray-2100, eds-black If you want gray-500 for box background color, class would be: 'box--bg-gray-500'. If you want eds-black for box border color, class would be: 'box--border-eds-black'. **To achieve full height, use the class `box--full-height`. Full height style is not available from `box--float-right`, `box--float-left`, `box--fix-left` and `box--fix-right` classes.** ```html
